trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para construir as formas singular e plural de palavras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que corresponde às regras de idioma aplicadas às formas singular e plural das palavras.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> que aplica regras de idioma que correspondem ao <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> culture.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cultura do <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica qual idioma regras se aplicam a singulars e plurais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser analisado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is plural.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a palavra especificada está no plural.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the word is plural; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a palavra estiver no plural, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> métodos podem retornar `true` para a mesma palavra.

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os dois métodos retornará `true` para a palavra "fish".

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser analisado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is singular.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a palavra especificada está no singular.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the word is singular; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a palavra estiver no singular, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> métodos podem retornar `true` para a mesma palavra.

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os dois métodos retornará `true` para a palavra "fish".

trans-unit.source: The word to be made plural.
trans-unit.target: A palavra a ser convertida no plural.

trans-unit.source: Returns the plural form of the specified word
trans-unit.target: Retorna a forma plural da palavra especificada

trans-unit.source: The plural form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: A forma plural do parâmetro de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The word to be made singular.
trans-unit.target: A palavra a ser colocada no singular.

trans-unit.source: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a forma singular da palavra especificada.

trans-unit.source: The singular form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: A forma singular do parâmetro de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> no <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.
